H0.text: what government did the roman empire have. Oligarchy

H1.text: what government did the roman empire have. Aristocracy

H2.text: what government did the roman empire have. Theocracy

H3.text: what government did the roman empire have. Monarchy

A4.text: The Imperial cult of ancient Rome identified emperors and some members of their families with divinely sanctioned authority (auctoritas). The rite of apotheosis signified the deceased emperor's deification.

A5.text: The Roman Senate granted Octavian overarching military power (imperium) and the new title of Augustus, marking his accession as the first Roman emperor.
